## Most valuable skills

::: notes
Speaker: Matt StackOverflow Data
:::

- How best to assign an absolute value?
  - Average salary data
- How to determine skill competency?
  - Track skills people use in their jobs
- Limitations
  - We can only track "technical" skills

## The Stack Overflow Developer Survey

- Conducted every year
- One of the best sources of data on tech trends
- Opt-in survey of users of SO products
- Job types tracked:
  - Data engineer
  - Data scientist or machine learning specialist
  - Data or business analyst
  - Developer, AI
- Only skills >10% of the population has
